original_title: 警視庁物語 ウラ付け捜査
overview: This time, the investigation division is investigating the case of a man who confessed to killing a woman in a labyrinth 2 years ago, adhering to the constitutional provision that "confessing a suspect is not a crime."  The 20nd work from the popular series "Keishicho Monogatari", which documents the activities of the First Investigation Division of the Capital Police Department.
title: Police Department Story Pt.20: Backing Investigation
